mapper.insert: insert into sea_search_keywords (aid, keyword, spwords, count, result, lasttime, tid) values (#{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{keyword,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{spwords,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lasttime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT})
mapper.update: update sea_search_keywords set keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=CHAR}, spwords = #{spwords,jdbcType=CHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, result = #{result,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lasttime = #{lasttime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tid = #{tid,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select aid, keyword, spwords, count, result, lasttime, tid from sea_search_keywords
